knimeNode.name: Path To URL
knimeNode.shortDescription: Convert a Path column to URL column

fullDescription.intro: This node converts a selected Path column into a column of the type URL, using the selected URI Exporter
fullDescription.option: A column containing valid Path values, which will be converted by this node
A list of available formats in which the URL can be exported

ul.li: Append column: Append the new column to the table with the provided column name
Replace: Replace the selected column with the new Path column

fullDescription.option: This section contains further settings that can be configured based on the selected URL format. For example the expiration time of exported URL on AWS, GC or Azure can be fine tuned in this panel.

ports.inPort: Table that contains a Path column with path information.
ports.outPort: Input table with the corresponding URL column to the selected column. It will either be appended or replacing the old column, depending on the configuration.
